Chad Chiniquyâ€”CEO of Search Control

Over the last 20 years, entrepreneur and family man, Chad Chiniquy has proven himself successful in the real estate industry as the sole owner of the privately held company IMC Mortgage. With Chadâ€™s undying motivation and business-savvy attitude, he recognized the dominant shift taking place in the market, as real estate began to dip. He observed a powerful new trend moving towards a fresh real estate industry, but not the traditional kind of real estate. The trend led Chad to the valuable real estate in cyberspace, which was becoming available at unfathomable rates. Web real estate was accessible in large amountsâ€”â€œland grabsâ€ like nothing else that has ever existedâ€”the internet. Unlike Television, Radio, or any other technological advancement, the internet could reach everyone in the world with relatively low costs. This technology grants a valuable tool, the ability to pull information through its backbone, search engines. As Chad saw, securing and controlling positions in the search results of Google and Yahoo became the direct path to the largest audience in history.

Understanding the opportunities in the budding search engine control industry, Chad became active online, personally building an online presence for himself. He experimentally launched his own infomercial on YouTube.com, which, to Chad, demonstrated the full power of social media as well as that of positive organic search results. As Chad stated:

â€œI instantly knew that this industry would offer exciting new opportunities in my own future as I was able to reflect my personality and profession through the internet. The internet facilitates communications and the availability of information in each individual industry. If I can create a positive presence for myself in the internet, I know that this is a powerful tool for others like me.â€

Having an internal drive along with close connections with industry experts, Chadâ€™s success in the online world was forthcoming. Ultimately, owners of the online reputation management firm, SearchControl.com, who shared his vision in the search engine control market and recognized his ability to effectively manage a business, recruited Chad to lead the company. As fate would have it, Chad found himself at the right time, in the right place, and with the right people to enter into this innovative market. Chad is now the Chief Executive Officer of SearchControl.com, which successfully services many large corporations, celebrities, public figures, and politicians in addition to offering low cost services to individual and small businesses.
